Obsidian Javelin.name: Obsidian Javelin
Obsidian Javelin.fullText:
Praetor Legate Attack 11Obsidian Javelin

You create a black, ghostly javelin of magical force. Its concussion drives your foe back and makes it a tempting target for your ally.

Encounter        Arcane, Force, Implement
Standard Action      Melee or Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Primary ability vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d8 + ability modifier force damage, and you push the target 3 squares.

Effect: The next ally who hits and damages the target before the end of your next turn gains resist 10 to all damage until the end of that ally’s next turn.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 65.
Obsidian Javelin.flavor: You create a black, ghostly javelin of magical force. Its concussion drives your foe back and makes it a tempting target for your ally.
Obsidian Javelin.onHit: 3d8 + ability modifier force damage, and you push the target 3 squares.
Obsidian Javelin.effect: The next ally who hits and damages the target before the end of your next turn gains resist 10 to all damage until the end of that ally’s next turn.

Dictator's Judgment.name: Dictator's Judgment
Dictator's Judgment.fullText:
Praetor Legate Attack 20Dictator's Judgment

You channel the power of Dictator Andropinis to pronounce a dire judgment on your foe. Your spell roots the target to the spot and crushes its will to resist you, and you offer a bounty of vitality on the head of the damned.

Daily        Arcane, Healing, Implement, Psychic
Standard Action      Close burst 10

Target: One creature in the burst

Attack: Primary ability vs. Will

Hit: 4d8 + ability modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Miss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Effect: The next ally who hits and damages the target before the end of the encounter regains hit points as though he or she had spent three healing surges.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 65.
Dictator's Judgment.flavor: You channel the power of Dictator Andropinis to pronounce a dire judgment on your foe. Your spell roots the target to the spot and crushes its will to resist you, and you offer a bounty of vitality on the head of the damned.
Dictator's Judgment.onHit: 4d8 + ability modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Dictator's Judgment.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Dictator's Judgment.effect: The next ally who hits and damages the target before the end of the encounter regains hit points as though he or she had spent three healing surges.

Dustwalk.name: Dustwalk
Dustwalk.fullText:
Praetor Legate Utility 12Dustwalk

You stride through the air in a whirling cloud of dust.

Encounter        Arcane
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can fly (hover) at your speed. You have an altitude limit of 1 square. You have concealment while flying or hovering.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 65.
Dustwalk.flavor: You stride through the air in a whirling cloud of dust.
Dustwalk.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can fly (hover) at your speed. You have an altitude limit of 1 square. You have concealment while flying or hovering.
